page.title: 16HOUSING.
page.content: We in Albrighton regard ourselves as very lucky.We all have gardens in which to play and plenty of open spaces to exercise our pets. We have no high-rise tower blocks and very few flats.Some flats are found over the shops and in two small developments where provision is made for the elderly. Approximately a quarter of the houses are semi-detached or terraced council owned homes and a small proportion are terraced houses occupied by R.A.F. personnel stationed at Cosford.The rest are privately owned semis or detached houses and bungalows.It is unlikely that there will be any further housing development in the area. Most of the surrounding farms are owner occupied.
